document_name: Law No. 82 D/2014 establishing a set of green fiscal rules
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/PRT/2014/PRT-2014-12-31-Law No. 82 D_2014 establishing a set of green fiscal rules_9a61b5000eedcbacf7c34f149559468d.pdf
document_description: This law creates a series of tax breaks for low emissions vehicles, energy efficient buildings, and sustainable forest management.
